function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases propagating in the built environment due to workforce shortage and structural limitations in food and health systems","Impact":"Economic, livelihood, and health consequences for vulnerable communities","Mitigation":"Improve workforce capacity, enhance structural capabilities, and prioritize resources for vulnerable communities","Technologies":"Health monitoring technologies, remote healthcare systems, and targeted resource allocation systems","People":"Vulnerable communities, low-income individuals, and marginalized groups","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government agencies, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Global health care systems reaching capacity limits","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems and reduced access to care","Mitigation":"Expand healthcare capacity, implement telemedicine, and prioritize preventive measures","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, healthcare infrastructure expansion, and predictive healthcare analytics","People":"General population, especially in densely populated areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare institutions, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Severe restrictions to mobility exacerbating social inequalities","Impact":"Increased disparities in access to resources and opportunities","Mitigation":"Provide equitable access to remote schooling, work, and essential services","Technologies":"Remote communication technologies, digital infrastructure, and resource distribution systems","People":"Low-income individuals, marginalized communities, and women","Owner":"Government agencies, educational institutions, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Economic recession highlighting risks associated with hyper-connected economic and financial systems","Impact":"Systemic risks and instability in global economic and financial systems","Mitigation":"Promote diversification, enhance resilience, and improve risk management practices","Technologies":"Financial modeling and analysis tools, risk assessment and monitoring systems, and supply chain optimization technologies","People":"Economic and financial stakeholders, businesses, and policymakers","Owner":"Financial institutions, regulatory authorities, and international organizations"}]}
